data.name: 0000 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: All right, Let's get started!

data.name: 0001 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A mountain of papers from the library room stood right before my eyes.

data.name: 0002 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We're gonna search through all of these?

data.name: 0003 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Isn't that obvious, why else would I have brought them?

data.name: 0004 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess so but…

data.name: 0005 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This isn't something we can finish in one day.

data.name: 0006 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, less talk more work!

data.name: 0007 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You understand what we're looking for right, Kyon?

data.name: 0008 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...The school's records

data.name: 0009 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We need to find out if any students have won an award for music before.

data.name: 0010 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Exactly, so hurry up and get started!

data.name: 0011 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll go through this pile, so you can take the one over there

data.name: 0012 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, yeah...

data.name: 0013 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After glaring at me for my lifeless response, Haruhi got to work.

data.name: 0014 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now then, should I take this seriously, or should I...

data.name: 0015 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nah, I'll just go along with her for now.

data.name: 0016 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's see, I guess I'll start here…

data.name: 0017 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The first document I picked up was about the school's history.

data.name: 0018 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha-what is this word, the letters are so small I can't read them.

data.name: 0020 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I've been reading through this for more than an hour now…

data.name: 0021 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now that I think about it, this is just one of Haruhi's fantasies.

data.name: 0022 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No matter how much I look, I'm not going to find anything.

data.name: 0023 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, I think we're wasting our time with this you know…

data.name: 0024 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no need for me to try this hard to get along with Haruhi.

data.name: 0025 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll just move my hands around and pretend I'm looking for something.

data.name: 0026 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: On the other hand, I guess I haven't found anything to disprove your theory.

data.name: 0027 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If that happened, this whole ordeal would be over by now.

data.name: 0028 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With new motivation, I started looking for something to prove her wrong with.

data.name: 0029 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm, I've ended up working pretty hard on this.

data.name: 0030 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After reading a book called "Explaining psychic phenomenon with plasma",

data.name: 0031 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I was ready to confront Haruhi.

data.name: 0032 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I feel like I'm a bit biased to this but.

data.name: 0033 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It should have more than enough evidence to persuade her.

data.name: 0034 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm not sure if what's written here is true.

data.name: 0035 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It just needs to be enough for her to give up.

data.name: 0036 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, have you finished yet?

data.name: 0037 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asked Haruhi, who seemed like she had mostly finished examining her pile.

data.name: 0038 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, I've gone through all the important texts.

data.name: 0039 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Anything to report?

data.name: 0040 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hmm, that's a tricky question.

data.name: 0041 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I answered, subtly covering what I had found.

data.name: 0042 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What about you, did you find any useful information?

data.name: 0043 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, It's pretty interesting how they deserted all these books.

data.name: 0044 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi was surprisingly in a good mood.

data.name: 0045 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm guessing she found something that would only interest her.

data.name: 0046 (400.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll talk about it once we meet back with everyone. Let's rendezvous for now.

data.name: 0047 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After saying that, Haruhi left without looking once behind her.

data.name: 0048 (400.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi, wait Haruhi!

data.name: 0049 (400.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I have to chase after her before she causes trouble.

data.name: 0050 (400.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Search properly

data.name: 0051 (400.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Pretend to search
